sentence.Network_en: A perennial is a plant that lives indefinitely.
sentence.Network_cn: 多年生植物是指能存活很多年的植物。

sentence.Network_en: the perennial problem of water shortage
I wonder at her perennial youthfulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对她青春常驻感到惊讶.

perennial plant 多年生植物perennial spring 常年泉perennial stream 常劣
多年生草本(perennial herb) 指能生活二年以上的草本植物。有些植物的地下部分为多年生，如宿根或根茎、鳞茎、块根等变态器官， …
多年生草本植物（perennial herb），生活期比较长，一般为两年以上的草多年生草本植物——大丽菊　　本植物，如菊花、兰花、荷花 …
雏菊（Bellis perennis），别名延命菊，菊科，多年生矮小草本，簇生。高15－20厘米，叶自基部簇生，匙形或倒卵形，边缘具齿牙。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'remaining leafy throughout the year, evergreen'): from Latin perennis 'lasting the year through' + -ial

entry.tran: （尤指问题或困难）永恒的，持续的，亘古不变的
entry.def: You use perennial to describe situations or states that keep occurring or which seem to exist all the time; used especially to describe problems or difficulties.

example.ex: ...the perennial urban problems of drugs and homelessness...
example.tran: 毒品和无家可归这两个一直困扰城市的问题

example.ex: There's a perennial shortage of teachers with science qualifications.
example.tran: 有理科教学资格的老师一直都很短缺。

entry.def: A perennial plant lives for several years and has flowers each year.

example.tran: 开绿黄色花的多年生香草

means.word_mean: 1. a plant lasting for three seasons or more

sentences.sentence: "the common buttercup is a popular perennial plant"

means.word_mean: 2. lasting an indefinitely long time; suggesting self-renewal;

auth_sentence.content: There is one last lesson, which is perennial.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is one last lesson, which is perennial.

auth_sentence.content: Its cost and coverage are perennial subjects of debate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its cost and coverage are perennial subjects of debate.

auth_sentence.content: It mixes food crops with trees and perennial plants.
auth_sentence.res_content: It mixes food crops with trees and perennial plants.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"贯穿,自始至终;全部"; 2. 表示"假,坏"

stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+enn年+ial的→全年的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+man拿住+ent……的→永久拿住→永恒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+nic毒+ious……的→有毒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+plex重叠+ed……的→重叠在一起→困惑的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了→透视的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
per假,坏+funct作用+ory……的→没起好作用→草率的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+cuss摇动,敲打+ion表名词→一直敲打
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+oxide氧化物→贯穿的氧化物→过氧化物
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱
per假,坏+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
per假,坏+jur发誓+y状态→假发誓;参考:jury陪审团
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+forate打孔→打孔穿过→打洞
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+fuse流→流遍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弥漫,遍布,散布;渗入,渗透
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+me走+ate表动词→走过去→渗透过去
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+sist站→站到最后→坚持
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+suade劝→一直劝→劝说
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+use利用→[读书的时候]全部利用→细读
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vade走→走遍,遍及
per假,坏+petr石+ate表动词→像石头一样顽固的做坏事→专横,做坏事
per假,坏+vert转→转向坏→堕落
bi两+enn年+ial……的→两年[一次]的
per贯穿+enn年,一年+ial的→终年的
mill+enn年,一年+ium表名词→一千年

means.word_mean: 经常出现的;长期的;持久的; 长久的; 持续的; 反复出现的

sentences.en: the perennial dilemma between getting on at work and fulfilling family commitments
sentences.cn: 事业成功与履行家庭义务之间长期存在的矛盾

sentences.en: I wonder at her perennial youthfulness.
sentences.cn: 我对她青春常驻感到惊讶。
